name: Walter Kammergruber
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: Wrote my first blog post about crawling a webpage with nodejs and jQuery in 2010. My first web page was best viewed with Netscape 4.5.
what_can_i_contribute: Happy to talk about software architecture in general, but especially about web based ones. If you want to argue about whether JavaScript, Java, Ruby or Python is better, I will most likely argue against you.
